name: *(English: Steve, Pronunciation: /sti: v/)
description:
Steve is a Metroidvania about escaping a giant alien's body.

The controls are explained in-game, so I won't bother writing them here. Just know there is a pause menu with Escape, and that the saved game is persistent across sessions, so you don't have to play it in one go.

Between everyone having less time than planned, especially the artists, and having two newbies who knew nothing of Unity on our team, development was rough. But we like Steve, and we'll keep making his game better.

So extract the zip (the one that says Fixed, the original build did not work), click the .exe and enjoy a very ambitious game, that was probably too much for us to handle.

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!
